cast.name: 埃格伯特·让·魏伯 Egbert Jan Weeber
莫妮克·亨德里克斯 Monic Hendrickx

introduction: Everything in Elisabeth’s life is going pretty much according to plan. She’s about to marry her childhood sweetheart, and so far, she hasn’t encountered any major obstacles in her life. You might even say that she’s happy. One evening, however, the mysterious Arthur arrives on the scene, and everything changes. Unable to resist their immense mutual attraction, the pair surrender to each other totally. In that moment, everything else ceases to exist and they only have eyes for each other. Then it turns out that Arthur has a secret that will again transform Elisabeth’s life – and their budding romance – completely.
